thread.title: Robin
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Robin

author: Robin
title: Robin
text: I was able to get insurance for my home (after a lapse in my coverage) with no difficulty, thanks to Andy. He was very kind and sensitive to my situation and made the process easy. I had been turned away from several other companies before finding SelectQuote: , and they were able to search several different insurance carriers quickly. Thank you so much!
